issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description: We are experiencing an issue where the launch screen of the app (we use 9 patch) is shown twice. It flickers for half a second and then shows the root window of the app. We are on 8.1.0 (master from ~3 weeks ago, we cannot use current master due to TIMOB-27053) so hopefully this can be fixed soon.
fields.summary: Android: Launch screen is shown twice
